section.title: Introduction
section.p: Mailing Lists are the primary communication channels for all projects at The Apache Software Foundation. Therefore, this applies to Apache PDFBox, too. If you have any questions about or problems with Apache PDFBox, you can get them addressed on the Users Mailing List. If you like to participate in the development of Apache PDFBox, the Developer Mailing List is the place to be. If you like to keep track of what's being changed inside the project, you can subscribe to the Commit Mailing list.

li.a: Get the source from the Subversion repository

section.title: Users Mailing List
section.p: This is where you can post your questions about and problems with PDFBox. All committers (developers) are required to be subscribed to this mailing list. When in doubt which mailing list to use, use this one.

ul.li: To subscribe (digest only): Send email to users-digest-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To subscribe fully: Send email to users-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To receive information about the mailing list: Send email to users-help@pdfbox.apache.org.
To unsubscribe: Send email to users-unsubscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To post: Send email to users@pdfbox.apache.org.

section.title: Developers Mailing List
section.p: This is where the committers and interested contributors discuss the further development of Apache PDFBox.

ul.li: To subscribe (digest only): Send email to dev-digest-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To subscribe fully: Send email to dev-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To receive information about the mailing list: Send email to dev-help@pdfbox.apache.org.
To unsubscribe: Send email to dev-unsubscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To post: Send email to dev@pdfbox.apache.org.

section.title: Commits Mailing List
section.p: This is where all the notification mails from Subversion commits and issue tracker changes get sent. This mailing list is not used for discussions.

ul.li: To subscribe (digest only): Send email to commits-digest-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To subscribe fully: Send email to commits-subscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
To receive information about the mailing list: Send email to commits-help@pdfbox.apache.org.
To unsubscribe: Send email to commits-unsubscribe@pdfbox.apache.org.
